name: create_order
attributes: # [doc = " 新規注文作成：注文ID を受け取り、初期状態をまとめて設定"]
body: * ctx . accounts . order = Order { owner : ctx . accounts . user . key () , bump , order_id , items_count : 0 , total_price : 0 , status : String :: from ("created") , last_updated_ts : ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp , } ;

name: add_item
attributes: # [doc = " 商品追加：個数・単価から合計金額を計算し、状態とタイムスタンプも更新"]
body: let o = & mut ctx . accounts . order ;
o . last_updated_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: complete_order
attributes: # [doc = " 注文完了：状態とタイムスタンプを更新"]
body: let o = & mut ctx . accounts . order ;
o . last_updated_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: cancel_order
attributes: # [doc = " 注文取消：状態とタイムスタンプを更新"]
body: let o = & mut ctx . accounts . order ;
o . last_updated_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在のブロック時間を取得"]

fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Order（PDA 検証 + オーナーチェック）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"order" , owner . key () . as_ref () , & order . order_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = order . bump , has_one = owner)]

fields.attribute: # [doc = " タイムスタンプ更新用"]
